event.title: Cost Effective Relocation Services from Pune to Other Cities
event.description:
Welcome to Movingsolutions.in(Packers and Movers Portal) – a leading moving company in India. For long time, we are engaged in offering packing and moving services in different parts of cities and towns of India. We not take immense pleasure to offer our moving services in your city – Pune. We offer wide range of shifting and relocation services at the cost effective rate.

We offer packers and movers in Pune for:

Household Shifting
Office Shifting
Commercial or Business Shifting
Car Carrier and Transportation Services
Warehousing and Storage Facilities
Courier and Parcel Services
Freight Forwarding and Logistic Services
Domestic and International Shifting Services
Professional Packing and Moving Services

Reasons to choose us:

Highly experienced workers and staff
Utmost care of goods during the entire shifting
Economical charges for packing and moving services
Prompt and punctual delivery of goods

Need for packers and movers in Pune?

Fill up the query form mentioning your needs and send to get free quotes by packers and movers Pune. We assure you for economical and hassle free shifting experience with packers and movers from Pune to Hyderabad & packers and movers from Pune to Bangalore. Please give us the chance to serve you.

Packers and Movers Pune Charges Approx. for Local Shifting in Pune

Estimated packers and movers charges for local household shifting in Pune with few items can be around Rs 3,000 - Rs 8,000. And for complete household goods shifting, the standard rates would be Rs 6,000 - Rs 18,000.

Professional packers and movers in Pune charges will depend on which company you choose and many other factors. Many companies don’t consider distance in case of a local move. But some companies also consider the distance. Here are approximate movers and packers Pune charges and rates depending upon the volume of belongings.

1 BHK house moving

Up To 12 km: Rs 3,500 - 8,000

13 km to 30 km: Rs 4,500 - 9,000

Above 31 KM: Rs 5,500 - 10,000

2 BHK house shifting

Up To 12 km: Rs 4,500 - 9,000

13 km to 30 km: Rs 5,500 - 11,000

Above 31 KM: Rs 6,500 - 13,000

2-3 BHK house move

Up To 12 km: Rs 5,500 - 13,000

13 km to 30 km: Rs 6,500 - 13,000

Above 31 KM: Rs 7,500 - 15,000

3 BHK home shifting

Up To 12 km: Rs 6,500 - 15,000

13 km to 30 km: Rs 8,500 - 17,000

Above 31 KM: Rs 9,500 - 19,000

4 BHK house shifting

Up To 12 km: Rs 8,500 - 17,000

13 km to 30 km: Rs 10,500 - 21,000

Above 31 KM: Rs 12,500 - 21,000

Few household items

800 km to 1300 km: Rs 10,000 - 17,000

1300 km to 1900 km: Rs 11,000 - 21,000

Complete house items

1300 km to 1900 km: Rs 16,000 - 32,000
